item.title: Contribution Workflow
item.description: The source of this website resides in the /website folder of the project source. All the content, including all documentation, is managed in /website/content as markdown files. item.title: Preview website locally
item.description: This website is only tested with Hugo extended version 0.70.0 Requirements Install Hugo extended Install asciidoctor Usage Run make gen-docs to generate documentation pa ges from the project APIs (protos and CRDs) Run hugo server and browse http://localhost:1313/ to preview the website locally The website is refreshed as you make content changes.
